“Facebook Marketplace is a convenient and popular online platform where users can buy, sell, and trade goods within their local communities. Launched in 2016, it leverages Facebook’s massive user base to connect people looking to sell their unwanted items with those looking to buy. Whether you’re clearing out clutter or hunting for bargains, Facebook Marketplace offers a user-friendly interface, various listing categories, and robust communication tools to facilitate smooth transactions.”

“In this course, students will learn how to effectively use Facebook Marketplace to buy and sell items. Topics covered will include creating and managing listings, optimizing item descriptions and photos, communicating safely with buyers and sellers, understanding pricing strategies, and navigating the platform’s features for a seamless experience. Additionally, students will gain insights into best practices for safe transactions and resolving disputes.”

excerpt.rendered: Welcome to ‘Mastering Facebook Marketplace: A Comprehensive Guide to Buying and Selling.
